text: Viktor Yevgenievich Panin (; 10 November 1930 – 25 September 2020) was a Soviet and Russian physicist and professor. He was an advisor of the Russian Academy of Sciences. He was an expert in the fields of solid mechanics, plastic deformation and physical materials. Panin was born in Semey, then- Soviet Union. Panin died on 25 September 2020 in Tomsk, Russia at the age of 89.Скончался основатель ИФПМ томского Академгородка Виктор Панин ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Russian physicists Category:Russian educators
title: Viktor Panin
